Br.API.ParticleEffect

类 ParticleEffect.ParticleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • Br.API.ParticleEffect.ParticleEffect.ParticleData
  • 直接已知子类:
    ParticleEffect.BlockData, ParticleEffect.ItemData
    封闭类:
    ParticleEffect

    public abstract static class ParticleEffect.ParticleData
extends Object
    Represents the particle data for effects like ParticleEffect.ITEM_CRACK, ParticleEffect.BLOCK_CRACK and ParticleEffect.BLOCK_DUST

    This class is part of the ParticleEffect Library and follows the same usage conditions

    从以下版本开始:
    1.6
    作者:
    DarkBlade12

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ParticleData(org.bukkit.Material material, byte data)
      Construct a new particle data

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte getData()
      Returns the data value of this data
      org.bukkit.Material getMaterial()
      Returns the material of this data
      int[] getPacketData()
      Returns the data as an int array for packet construction
      String getPacketDataString()
      Returns the data as a string for pre 1.8 versions

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ParticleData

        public ParticleData(org.bukkit.Material material,
                    byte data)
        Construct a new particle data
        参数:
        material - Material of the item/block
        data - Data value of the item/block

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMaterial

        public org.bukkit.Material getMaterial()
        Returns the material of this data
        返回:
        The material

      • getData

        public byte getData()
        Returns the data value of this data
        返回:
        The data value

      • getPacketData

        public int[] getPacketData()
        Returns the data as an int array for packet construction
        返回:
        The data for the packet

      • getPacketDataString

        public String getPacketDataString()
        Returns the data as a string for pre 1.8 versions
        返回:
        The data string for the packet
